title: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: The bug is related to the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog. When I preview the report and click the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the expected behavior is that the default values for the parameters are shown in the value boxes. This would allow me to easily modify the parameter that I want to change. However, the observed behavior is that in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog, all values are empty. This means that if I want to modify one parameter, I have to input all the values again, which is time-consuming and inconvenient.
OB: When I preview the report and click the 'Show Report Parameters' button, I see that all values in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog are empty.
EB: When I preview the report and click the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the default values for the parameters should be shown in the value boxes in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog.
SR:
1. Preview the report.
2. Click the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
3. Observe that the default values for the parameters are not shown in the value boxes in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog.
